ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only items
ygData.msgSnippet: okay, we have gone through what this item is, but how do you start the quest? what continent? who do you talk to? etc.... -Aeramus ... From: Farr, Robert
ygData.messageBody:
okay, we have gone through what this item is, but how do you start the
quest? what continent? who do you talk to? etc....

-Aeramus

----- Original Message -----
From: Farr, Robert <robert.farr@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 12, 1999 10:17 AM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items


> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
>
> ICK.. *slaps self on forehead*
>
> Sorry.. please ignore me.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Greg Short [SMTP:eq@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, August 12, 1999 8:37 AM
> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items
> >
> > From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
> >
> > A Glowing Stein is NOT a crude stein.
> >
> > - Baels
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Farr, Robert <robert.farr@...>
> > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>

> > Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items
> >
> >
> > > From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
> > >
> > > No it's not. You can either complete the quest for one or just kill
> > troll
> > > bouncers since they drop them.
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Greg Short [SMTP:eq@...]
> > > > Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 10:00 PM
> > > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only items
> > > >
> > > > From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
> > > >

can
> > do
> > > > the
> > > > quest. Whether it stays that way is up to enchanters hehe,
> > > >
> > > > Baels.
> > > >

> > sort
> > of
> > > > > "class" only items except the enchanter? or perhaps i have not run
> > into
> > > > one
> > > > > yet? I consider myself to know much about the magical items in
this
> > game
> > > > > seeing as how i have a good majority of them heh. but no enchanter
> > only
> > > > > items? anyone run across one?
> > > > >
